description: /Lotus/Language/Items/ClanCreatorDesc

name: /Lotus/Language/Items/Limbocodename
description: /Lotus/Language/Items/LimboCodeDesc

name: Alloy Plate
description: Carbon steel plates used to reinforce Grineer armor.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.4.3
patchlogs.changes: Ferrite has replace Alloy Plate as a Resource Drop in Void missions.

name: Alpha Corruptor
description: Inert on its own this corruptor is highly effective if mixed with its Beta counterpart. Properly mixed, these will destabilize Fomorian Reactors much faster than their Stable counterparts. This volatile item cannot be simultaneously equipped with Beta Corruptors. Recommended for Tenno operating as a team.

name: Antiserum Injector Fragment
description: A component of the Antiserum Injector

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.5.1 + 19.5.2
patchlogs.changes: Reduced value of Antiserum Injector Fragments from 25 to 5 credits.

name: Archwing Launcher Segment
description: Adds the Archwing Launcher to the foundry

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.0.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Archwing Launcher Segment not being Chat linkable.

name: Argon Crystal
description: Void based radioactive resource that decays every day it is out of the void.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Update 22.16.0
patchlogs.changes: A special UI message is now displayed when picking up a Syndicate Medallion or Cetus Wisp (similar to Argon Crystal).

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Update 22.15.0
patchlogs.changes: A special UI message is now displayed when picking up Tellurium, or any of the Eidolon Shards (similar to Argon Crystal).

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Hotfix 22.13.3
patchlogs.changes: Picking up a Syndicate Medallion, Exceptional Sentient Core, or Flawless Sentient Core will now display the same special UI message like when you pick up an Argon Crystal.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Update 22.13.0
patchlogs.changes: Ivara’s Prowl will now only steal from each enemy once total, instead of once per Ivara. Our intent is to mirror how Nekros’ Desecrate also functions, considering the recent movement of Sentient Cores to certain Sentient variants. It’s rewarding to be the warmly welcomed Nekros in an Argon Crystal run, and we hope Ivara will now be welcomed equivalently.

patchlogs.name: Octavia’s Anthem: Hotfix 20.6.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed being unable to craft the Destreza. This also fixes other items requiring Argon Crystals not being craftable.

patchlogs.name: Update 13.7.1
patchlogs.changes: Removed Vitality and other common gear from Void Vor’s drops, replaced with option of Orokin Cell or Argon Crystal AND one of four Cicero Crisis mods.

name: Arsenal Segment
description: Install this segment in order to enable the Arsenal within your orbiter.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.8.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed players stuck in Vor’s Prize without the Arsenal Segment. You will receive this Segment on login.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Update 19.8.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a rare issue of not receiving the Arsenal Segment after completing Vor’s Prize.

name: Arsenal Segment
description: Install this segment in order to enable the Arsenal within your orbiter.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.8.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed players stuck in Vor’s Prize without the Arsenal Segment. You will receive this Segment on login.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Update 19.8.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a rare issue of not receiving the Arsenal Segment after completing Vor’s Prize.

name: Ayatan Anasa Sculpture
description: This kinetic Orokin sculpture springs to life when filled with Ayatan Stars. It may also be a source of Endo.

name: Ayatan Ayr Sculpture
description: This kinetic Orokin sculpture springs to life when filled with Ayatan Stars. It may also be a source of Endo.

description: This kinetic Orokin sculpture springs to life when filled with Ayatan Stars. It may also be a source of Endo.

description: This kinetic Orokin sculpture springs to life when filled with Ayatan Stars. It may also be a source of Endo.

description: This kinetic Orokin sculpture springs to life when filled with Ayatan Stars. It may also be a source of Endo.

description: This kinetic Orokin sculpture springs to life when filled with Ayatan Stars. It may also be a source of Endo.

name: Ayatan Vaya Sculpture
description: This kinetic Orokin sculpture springs to life when filled with Ayatan Stars. It may also be a source of Endo.

name: Beta Corruptor
description: Inert on its own this corruptor is highly effective if mixed with its Alpha counterpart. Properly mixed, these will destabilize Fomorian Reactors much faster than their Stable counterparts. This volatile item cannot be simultaneously equipped with Alpha Corruptors. Recommended for Tenno operating as a team.

name: Bountiful Seed
description: Medallion of the New Loka syndicate. Can be traded in on relay syndicate hubs for additional standing.

name: Breath Of The Eidolon
description: A gas found solely on the plains of Eidolon, refined to its purest form.

name: Cerulean Fungus Extract
description: Extracted from a Cerulean Fungus colony.

name: Chitinous Husk
description: A grizzly trophy extracted from the corpse of a Juggernaut.

name: Circuits
description: Various electronic components.

name: Control Module
description: Autonomy processor for Robotics. A Corpus design.

name: Cross-Matrix Widget
description: Chance for each scan with the Synthesis Scanner to count as two scans.

name: Cryotic
description: Usually found in extreme sub-zero environments, Cryotic instantly freezes anything it contacts.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.3.4
patchlogs.changes: Reduced the Magus Husk from 7100 to 710 Cryotic per item.

patchlogs.name: Update 18.2.0
patchlogs.changes: Players will no longer be able to join a mid-mission Excavation Mission after 300 Cryotic has been obtained in Sorties or Alerts.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.11.3
patchlogs.changes: Nightmare Excavation (Nodes & Alerts) now requires 500 units of Cryotic before extraction is enabled.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.1.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue with players not always receiving Cryotic after completing an Excavation mission.

patchlogs.name: Update 14.5: Operation Cryotic Front!
patchlogs.changes: Operation: Cryotic Front!:

name: Cryptographic Alu
description: Excess circuitry disposed of during the Razorback manufacturing process, these components only appear in the vicinity of high level outer-orbit Corpus facilities after a Razorback Armada has been launched.

name: Data-Parse Widget
description: Synthesis Scanner will now show target enemy weaknesses and resistances.

name: Datum
description: Medallion of the Cephalon Suda syndicate. Can be traded in on relay syndicate hubs for additional standing.

name: Defender Insignia
description: Medallion of the Steel Meridian syndicate. Can be traded in on relay syndicate hubs for additional standing.

name: Delta Beacon
description: Locator beacon broadcasting on the delta frequency

name: Dusklight Sarracenia
description: This robust, carnivorous plant has adapted to conditions in polluted waters.

name: Eidolon Lens
description: An enhanced Greater Lens that has been infused with Breath of the Eidolon.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Update 22.17.0 + 22.17.0.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Eidolon Lens Blueprints missing their ‘Conversion’ text.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Update 22.10.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Eidolon Lens Blueprint with no description text dropping from the Plains.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.0.9
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Eidolon Lens rewards from incursions not displaying properly.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.0.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed getting an ‘unknown error’ when claiming an Eidolon Lens.

name: Eidolon Madurai Lens
description: Channels a large amount of Affinity into Focus for the Madurai Way.

name: Eidolon Naramon Lens
description: Channels a large amount of Affinity into Focus for the Naramon Way.

description: Channels a large amount of Affinity into Focus for the Unairu Way.

name: Exalted Mark
description: Medallion of Red Veil syndicate. Can be traded in on relay syndicate hubs for additional standing.

name: Executive Quittance
description: Medallion of The Perrin Sequence syndicate. Can be traded in on relay syndicate hubs for additional standing.

name: Exilus Adapter
description: Fuses with a Warframe to create an additional Exilus Mod Slot.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.8.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the 750 Daily Tribute rewarding you 3 Exilus Adapters instead of the intended 1.

patchlogs.name: Octavia’s Anthem: Hotfix 20.4.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed built Exilus Adapters being offered as Rare Invasion rewards instead of the Blueprint. PLEASE NOTE this does not change the current invasion, but future ones.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.0.1
patchlogs.changes: Removed the Exilus Adapter Blueprint from Simaris, Natah Quest completion is now required to unlock this.

name: Ferrite
description: Alloy pellets used in Grineer manufacturing.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.4.3
patchlogs.changes: Ferrite has replace Alloy Plate as a Resource Drop in Void missions.

name: Flawless Seed
description: Medallion of the New Loka syndicate. Can be traded in on relay syndicate hubs for additional standing.

name: Forma
description: This shape-altering component is fundamental to Orokin construction. Allows you to change the polarity of a mod slot on a Warframe, Companions or Weapon and then resets their affinity to Unranked. This can only be used on Level 30 Warframes, Companions and Weapons.

patchlogs.name: Chains of Harrow: Update 21.2.0 + 21.2.0.1
patchlogs.changes: Forma count can now be seen on weapons and Warframes in the Inventory screen (similar to in the Arsenal).

patchlogs.name: Oberon Prime: Update 20.7.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed selecting ‘Mods’ on an un-Forma'd weapon with no Mods equipped resulting in the category selection disappearing.

patchlogs.name: Update 19: The War Within
patchlogs.changes: The Companion stasis grid will now display Polarization counts for pets who have been Forma’d.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.3.0
patchlogs.changes: T4S Rotation B: Forma Blueprint for Rare Fusion Core 5 Pack.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.11.4
patchlogs.changes: Reduced the frequency of Forma Blueprints dropping in T3 Defense Rotation C.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.16.2
patchlogs.changes: Tenno can now buy Forma directly from upgrade screen

name: Frostleaf
description: This resilient plant provides a natural food source in frigid areas of the Origin system.

patchlogs.name: The Silver Grove: Hotfix 4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed issues with scanning the Frostleaf plant.

name: Gallium
description: Soft metal used in microelectronics and energy weapons.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Update 22.10.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Gallium, Argon, and Rubedo Decorations appearing blown out when placed in your Orbiter.

patchlogs.name: Update 19.13.0
patchlogs.changes: Replaced Orokin Cell with Gallium, and replaced Neural Sensors with Morphics as a crafting requirement in the Rhino Blueprint. This is also in the interest of using Rare Resources found on earlier planets to allow for Rhino to be crafted earlier on!

description: Locator beacon broadcasting on the gamma frequency

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.0.5
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Focus Lens and Greater Focus Lens descriptions reference ‘ways’ instead of ‘paths’ in terms of the Focus followed.

description: Channels a greater amount of Affinity into Focus for the Madurai Way.

name: Kuva
description: A mysterious red fluid coveted by the Grineer Queens.

patchlogs.name: Beasts of the Sanctuary: Update 22.18.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Kuva Harvester timer sometimes staying on screen after it’s destroyed if there are 1 or more Clients.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Hotfix 22.17.4
patchlogs.changes: Kuva Guardians will now play their disarming animation properly, instead of having their Twin Rogga’s magically pop into their hands.We’Re Working On A Script To Give The Respective Shoulder Armor To Those Who Purchased The Tennogen Skin. We Will Update You Here When It Is Running/Complete. Script Has Been Run And Has Completed! Please Relog If You Purchased The Banshee Sonority Skin Pre-Hotfix.:

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Update 22.17.3
patchlogs.changes: Made spawn improvements to Kuva Catalysts to avoid getting stuck in geometry or unreachable places.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Update 22.17.0 + 22.17.0.1
patchlogs.changes: We’Re Working On A Retroactive Healing To Put Missing Earned Kuva In Inventories. We Will Update You Here! Pre-Hotfix Missing Kuva Has Been Retroactively Given To Affected Accounts - Please Relog To Receive!:

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Hotfix 22.16.5 + 22.16.5.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed broken Kuva Siphon/Flood missions.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Hotfix 22.16.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed some Operator amps not properly destroying Kuva clouds.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Hotfix 22.12.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Kuva Siphon sometimes missing shadows.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.6.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed bug with Sabotage and Assault missions with “Defend the Object” in the Kuva Fortress that caused progress stoppers in The War Within.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Update 22.6.0 + Hotfix 22.6.0.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed some Kuva-related sounds not playing for clients.

patchlogs.name: Warframe Update 22: Plains of Eidolon
patchlogs.changes: Capture missions will no longer have the chance to change to the Exterminate objective in Kuva Siphon missions.

patchlogs.name: Hydroid Prime: Hotfix 21.7.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a script error when triggering a Kuva Siphon.

patchlogs.name: Chains of Harrow: Hotfix 21.3.2
patchlogs.fixes: Removed Archwing from one of the Kuva Fortress extraction tiles.

patchlogs.name: Chains of Harrow: Update 21.3.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Kuva Siphons breaking when a Host Migration occurs at the start of the mission.

patchlogs.name: Chains of Harrow: Hotfix 21.0.8 + 21.0.8.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Kuva Braids randomly summoning Guardian Eximis.

patchlogs.name: Update 21: Chains of Harrow
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Kuva getting stuck in the ground and ceiling in multiple areas around the Corpus Ice Planet tileset.

patchlogs.name: Oberon Prime: Hotfix 20.6.2
patchlogs.changes: Kuva Jesters can no longer attach to relatively small enemies (shorter than 1.5m) or tall enemies (greater than 3m) to fix odd scaling issues as seen here:

patchlogs.name: Octavia’s Anthem: Hotfix 20.6.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed extracting as the Operator not applying Boosters to obtained Kuva.

patchlogs.name: Octavia’s Anthem: Update 20.3.0
patchlogs.changes: Kuva Siphon missions must now be fully completed to earn any Kuva from it.

patchlogs.name: Octavia’s Anthem: Hotfix 20.2.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Kuva Fortress security cameras being invisible when not looking directly at them.

patchlogs.name: Octavia's Anthem: Update 20.1.0
patchlogs.changes: Kuva Jesters now take normal ability damage (not CC damage) when attached to either the Kuva Guardian or you.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Kuva Guardians sometimes appearing invisible in-mission.

patchlogs.name: Octavia's Anthem: Hotfix 20.0.9
patchlogs.changes: Removed Kuva Dargyn’s from the Simulacrum.

patchlogs.name: Octavia's Anthem: Hotfix 20.0.8
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Liset flying through a massive rock when extracting from the Kuva Fortress.

patchlogs.name: Octavia's Anthem: Hotfix 20.0.6
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Kuva Jester animations looking stretched.

patchlogs.name: Banshee Prime: Hotfix 19.11.5 + 19.11.6
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Kuva Guardians Knockdown animation not playing for Clients.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.9.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed massive performance issues on Kuva Fortress Defense when walking around and meleeing around the Defense Target.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.9.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Kuva Jesters standing on Kuva Guardian’s shoulders when shot with Ivara’s Sleep Arrow.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.6.3
patchlogs.changes: Improved Operator Void Dash aiming and collision on Kuva Clouds to be more forgiving.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed incorrect Lotus transmissions during a Kuva Siphon.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.6.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed several Kuva enemies and objects missing from the Codex.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Update 19.6.0 + 19.6.0.1
patchlogs.changes: In an effort to address the issue of people not noticing the movement of The Kuva Fortress, we have made the loop completion time odd rather than a 24 hour cycle. Players who were logging in around the same daily time found that the Kuva Fortress would always be roughly in the same position, and was restricting the variety of Kuva Siphon missions available.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Update 19.5
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Kuva being collectible by non-operator

patchlogs.name: The War Within: Hotfix 19.3.2 + 19.3.2.1
patchlogs.changes: Kuva Siphon missions are now locked sooner to prevent players from joining after event has completed.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed defense turrets being destructible on Kuva Fortress.

patchlogs.name: The War Within: Update 19.2.0
patchlogs.changes: Made numerous performance improvements in the Kuva Fortress tileset.

patchlogs.name: The War Within: 19.1.0 Ash Revisited
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed issues of long load times in Kuva Fortress Assault missions.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 19.0.3
patchlogs.changes: Fixed the Grineer Icon on the Kuva Scimitar skin floating.

patchlogs.name: The War Within: Hotfix 19.0.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed not being able to purchase the Xiphos Kuva Skin.

name: Landing Craft Foundry Segment
description:
Upgrades the Orbiter's Foundry with the following features:
- Allows construction of Landing Craft- Allows construction of Air Support Charges
Equip Air Support Charges in your Loadout's Gear

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Update 22.9.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed not being able to Chat link the "Landing Craft Foundry Segment" and the "Nutrio Incubator Upgrade Segment".

name: Lawful Medallion
description: Medallion of the Arbiters of Hexis syndicate. Can be traded in on relay syndicate hubs for additional standing.

name: Lephantis Nav Coordinate
description: Coordinate used to locate the Lephantis.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed localization descriptions on Lephantis Nav Coordinates, they now refer to Lephantis instead of Golem.

name: Lunar Pitcher
description: This carnivorous plant can be found growing in the wilderness on Lua.

name: Madurai Lens
description: Channels Affinity into Focus for the Madurai Way.

name: Mandachord
description: A rare Orokin instrument.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Hotfix 22.16.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Mandachord song previews and soundpacks being muted.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Hotfix 22.14.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed rotating Octavia before entering the Mandachord resulting in the Mandachord not displaying correctly and parts of the Orbiter clipping into the UI.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Update 22.12.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Arsenal Mandachord being unusable after first switching from a different Warframe to Octavia.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Update 22.10.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed attempting to change your Mandachord song as an Operator in the Simulacrum, breaking Octavia and getting a script error.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.8.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Mandachord Reload button not reloading the song and preventing any audio from the notes.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.0.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Octavia’s Mandachord Instrument Packs being sold for Credits in the Market.

patchlogs.name: Chains of Harrow: Hotfix 21.2.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a rare case of loading into a mission with an empty Mandachord which results in Octavia dealing no damage as per: https://forums.warframe.com/topic/823653-help-i-broke-my-mandachordoctavia/

patchlogs.name: Update 21: Chains of Harrow
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a case where you were unable to save a Chat-Linked Song in the Mandachord.

patchlogs.name: Octavia’s Anthem: Hotfix 20.2.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed not being able to press the Warframe specific option in Appearance submenu of Arsenal (Mandachord for Bard, Metamorphosis for Equinox etc...) when Arsenal is opened by Operator.

patchlogs.name: Octavia's Anthem: Hotfix 20.2.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed using a controller in Steam Big Picture to view Mandachord songs displaying a string of text beside the song named.

patchlogs.name: Octavia’s Anthem: Hotfix 20.1.1
patchlogs.changes: Updated the Mandachord art & added some optimization improvements.

patchlogs.name: Octavia's Anthem: Update 20.1.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed volume sliders in Mandachord lerping linearly instead of exponentially.

patchlogs.name: Octavia's Anthem: Hotfix 20.0.8
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Mandachord puzzle UI in Octavia’s Anthem quest having unclickable notes in fullscreen 4:3 resolutions.

patchlogs.name: Octavia's Anthem: Hotfix 20.0.6
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed not being able to use the Mandachord when near placeable decorations in the Landing Craft.

patchlogs.name: Octavia's Anthem: Hotfix 20.0.4
patchlogs.changes: Mandachord Song names can no longer include ‘,’ or ‘:’ due to linking errors in chat.

patchlogs.name: Octavia’s Anthem: Hotfix 20.0.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a crash with the Mandachord.

name: Mark
description: Medallion of Red Veil syndicate. Can be traded in on relay syndicate hubs for additional standing.

patchlogs.name: Beasts of the Sanctuary: Update 22.19.0
patchlogs.changes: Shortened "Warframe Animation Sets" to just "Animation Sets" in the Market category since it's redundant and crowds the box.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Hotfix 22.16.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a script error when attempting to access the Market from the ESC menu while installing a Star in an Ayatan.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Update 22.16.0
patchlogs.changes: The Market previews will now display your current equipped Warframe/Sentinel when viewing Armor Bundles.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Hotfix 22.13.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed some TennoGen items having a giftable option in the Market. Upon selecting this it would fail and not charge you the respective Platinum.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Update 22.13.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Kronen not displaying when searching ‘Tonfa’ in the Market/Arsenal.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Hotfix 22.12.5
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Harrow Graxx Skin having a giftable option in the Market. Upon selecting this it will fail and not charge you the respective Platinum.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Hotfix 22.12.4
patchlogs.changes: *We Are Aware Of An Issue Where You Appear To Be Able To Gift The Harrow Graxx Tennogen Skin In The Market. Upon Selecting This It Will Fail And Not Charge You The Respective Platinum. We’Re Working On Removing The Unintended Option For Our Next Hotfix/Update.:

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Hotfix 22.12.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Market Warframe Skins/Helmets that use the default diorama showing the equipped Warframe instead of the Warframe the Skin is for.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.11.1
patchlogs.changes: Improved the lighting in the Market diorama.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Update 22.10.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed color customization for Tenno Markings affecting Accessories as well.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.5.1
patchlogs.changes: Updated Volt Proto Skin Market banner.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Update 22.5.0 + 22.5.0.1
patchlogs.changes: Clarified verbiage when buying a Warframe from the Market. Players were confused by thinking they got a Reactor, when really it’s an ‘installed Reactor’.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.2.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed certain Kavat Skins being shown in Market previews for Kavats Armor even though those Skins are not compatible with Armor.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.0.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Octavia’s Mandachord Instrument Packs being sold for Credits in the Market.

patchlogs.name: Warframe Update 22: Plains of Eidolon
patchlogs.changes: The in-game Market now includes a separate category for Warframe Deluxe Bundles!

patchlogs.name: Hydroid Prime: Hotfix 21.7.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed getting stuck in the ESC menu when attempting to access the Market during Vor’s Prize.

patchlogs.name: Hydroid Prime: Update 21.6.0
patchlogs.changes: Stalker Death Marks

patchlogs.name: Update 21: Chains of Harrow
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed viewing one item in the Market and clicking on a related item sometimes causing duplicate items to appear in the diorama if you press ESC before the related item loaded completely.

patchlogs.name: Octavia’s Anthem: Update 20.6.0 + 20.6.0.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Focus icons appearing over numerous Market items.

patchlogs.name: Octavia's Anthem: Hotfix 20.5.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed missing fade FX from Market icons.

patchlogs.name: Octavia's Anthem: Hotfix 20.0.6
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed missing descriptions for Instrument Packs in the Market.

patchlogs.name: Banshee Prime: Hotfix 19.11.5 + 19.11.6
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the MK-1 Kunai and MK-1 Strun not being purchasable in the Market when completing Vor’s Prize.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.11.2
patchlogs.changes: Improved visibility of previewing Sugatras on large weapons in Market dioramas.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.9.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Nidus’ Market Build tab stating his parts drop from the ‘Purify’ mission when it’s actually the ‘Infested Salvage’ mission.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.6.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed more items missing the Build tab in the Market.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.6.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed numerous weapons and items not having a ‘Build’ tab in the Market.

patchlogs.name: The War Within: Update 19.4 + 19.4.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed some unreleased Corpus Cosmetics from showing in the Market

patchlogs.name: Update 19: The War Within
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Vasto Day of the Dead skin not appearing as ‘Owned’ in the Market.

patchlogs.name: Recurring Nightmares
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Valkyr’s Bonds being missing from the Market and not being able to equip them on Valkyr.

patchlogs.name: The Vacuum Within
patchlogs.changes: You can now place Resource decorations in your Landing Craft! Check out the Landing Craft section in the Market.

patchlogs.name: The Silver Grove: Update 1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Operator room music continuing to play when selecting the Market/Starchart from the menu.

patchlogs.name: The Silver Grove
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Heliocor not having information on its Blueprint location (Simaris) in the Market.

patchlogs.name: Specters of the Rail: Update 1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Orthos icon in the Market.

patchlogs.name: Specters of the Rail: Hotfix 4
patchlogs.changes: Market Changes:

patchlogs.name: Specters of the Rail: Hotfix 1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the resolution of Prime Access images in the Market.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.4.11
patchlogs.changes: Changed the description and names of Baro's 'Mark' items to better indicate their purpose and usability. They are now called Beacons.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.4.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed descriptions and typos across a variety of Market items.

patchlogs.name: Update 18.4.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue where coupons would not immediately show up in the Market upon reception of a coupon as a login reward.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.2.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Hyena Pack, Tyl Regor, Vay Hek and Infested Alad V not properly giving Death Marks to players.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.2.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed players not receiving a Death Mark if their Sentinel or Kubrow is responsible for the death of a boss.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.1.3.1
patchlogs.additions: The Winter Bundle and Winter Accessories Bundle have been added to the Market! You can find these by selecting Bundles in the Market and scrolling to the bottom. You can also purchase the skins separately under Warframes > Warframe Accessories.

patchlogs.name: Update 18.1.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed some Warframe skins not being properly viewable after previewing a Deluxe skin in the Market.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.0.7
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Cerata not being purchasable by Platinum in the Market.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.0.6 + 18.0.6.1
patchlogs.changes: Greater Lens Blueprints will no longer appear in the Market for players who have not completed The Second Dream Quest.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.0.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed some icons in the Market not properly having the correct aspect ratio.

patchlogs.name: Update 18: The Second Dream
patchlogs.additions: New Landing Craft: ScimitarScimitar: This blade-like landing craft is armed with Barrage Air Support. Find the Scimitar in the Market today!

patchlogs.name: Update 17.9.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Lato Vandal Halloween Skin from appearing in the Market on its own.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.8.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Mk-1 Kunai showing a Platinum cost in the Market.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.7
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue with Archwing Weapon Blueprints that are found in the Market being obtainable Archwing mission droptables.
patchlogs.additions: The Atlas Tartarus Alt Helmet is now available in the Market.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.6.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Day of the Dead Imperator Skin not showing an appropriate description in the Market. WOOOOOOO SPOOKY GHOST LEAK

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.6.1
patchlogs.changes: Improved the resolution on Trinity Prime’s image in the Market.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.4.5
patchlogs.additions: New Noggles are now available in the Market!  Add Oberon, Valkyr and Zephyr to your collection today!

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.3.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed purchased Prisma items not showing up in the Void Trader’s Market as purchased.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.2.5
patchlogs.changes: The Mastery Sigil that was given out via Inbox message has been added to the Market for 1 Credit!

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.0.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed inappropriate scale of Sigil icons in Market.

patchlogs.name: Update 17: Echoes Of The Sentient
patchlogs.changes: Players can now see a more detailed Noggle preview available in the Market.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue preventing players from exiting the Market when pushing ‘escape’ on a controller / gamepad.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed MK1-Furis showing a price of 120 Platinum in the Market.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.3: The New Protocols
patchlogs.changes: Fixed XP locked weapons in the Market not showing their cost.

patchlogs.name: Warframe: Sanctuary
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed grammatical error in the Gemini Nikana’s Market description.
patchlogs.additions: Tigrol Gene Masking Kit for Kubrow has been added to the Market!

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.16.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed incorrect Market description of Neural Sensors and Neurodes.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.14.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue caused by purchasing the Soma in the Marketplace.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.10.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed duplicate Bo melee weapons appearing in the Market and Codex.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.9
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed typo in the Itzal Pack Market description.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.7.0 Nova Prime
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed players being unable to purchase the Spearmint Scythes weapon skins from the Marketplace.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.6.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Patient Zero blueprint not appearing in Marketplace.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.5.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Dual Decurion blueprint appearing in Clan Tech, removed blueprint from Clan Tech Research. This is a Market blueprint for you to craft once you obtain the parts!

patchlogs.name: Mesa Update
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed player not being able to leave the Market after entering the Market

patchlogs.name: Update 15.1.0+15.1.01
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the in-game Market not showing the price of items if you've already purchased them.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 14.8.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed prices showing incorrectly/missing in the Market.

patchlogs.name: Update 14.7.0: Operation Gate Crash!
patchlogs.changes: Fixed an issue in the Market regarding proper classification of Kubrow starter kits and color bundles.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 14.0.5
patchlogs.changes: Don't show Market notification before unlocking the Market.
patchlogs.additions: Added in a XP locked message that will be received when the player attempts to purchase an item from the Market that is currently XP locked.

patchlogs.name: Update 13.3.0: Pack Hunters
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue with erroneous blueprints appearing in the Market place.

patchlogs.name: Update 9.7
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed text field for Market sale items in Russian language.

name: Maxim Medallion
description: Medallion of the Arbiters of Hexis syndicate. Can be traded in on relay syndicate hubs for additional standing.

name: Medallion
description: Medallion of the Arbiters of Hexis syndicate. Can be traded in on relay syndicate hubs for additional standing.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Update 22.17.0 + 22.17.0.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a long delay on Syndicate Medallion UI counter appearing.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Update 22.16.0
patchlogs.changes: A special UI message is now displayed when picking up a Syndicate Medallion or Cetus Wisp (similar to Argon Crystal).

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Hotfix 22.13.3
patchlogs.changes: Picking up a Syndicate Medallion, Exceptional Sentient Core, or Flawless Sentient Core will now display the same special UI message like when you pick up an Argon Crystal.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Update 22.2.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Sentient Cores counting towards the Medallion challenge of a "Find x Syndicate Medallions" Riven.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.0.6 + 22.0.6.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed redeeming more Syndicate Medallions than your daily limit prompting you with a ‘wasting Standing’ message. Redeeming Syndicate Medallions is not affected by your daily cap.

patchlogs.name: Octavia’s Anthem: Hotfix 20.2.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed not being able to redeem any Syndicate Medallions.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.5.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed various spawning issues with Syndicate Medallions and Rare Containers.

patchlogs.name: Update 19: The War Within
patchlogs.changes: You will no longer be able to see or pickup Syndicate Medallions if you have already completed that mission prior to being invited.

patchlogs.name: The Silver Grove: U2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Syndicate Medallions spawning in inaccessible locations.

patchlogs.name: Specters of the Rail: U2.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a Syndicate Medallion spawn point being at Extraction on Europa as per: https://www.reddit.com/r/Warframe/comments/4x9xi8/cheeky_de/

patchlogs.name: Update 17.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue that would cause Syndicate Medallions to lose their ‘glow’ when certain abilities are used nearby, making them very difficult to see.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.1.5
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed some potential issues with Medallions being invisible in missions.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.0.4
patchlogs.changes: Mag’s Greedy Pull Augment Mod will no longer pull Syndicate Medallions.

patchlogs.name: Update 17: Echoes Of The Sentient
patchlogs.changes: Increased the total number of Loot Crates and Syndicate Medallions spawned in Missions.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.9.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Syndicate Medallions becoming invisible during Syndicate Missions

patchlogs.name: Update 16.8.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Syndicate Medallions being invisible as per : https://forums.warframe.com/index.php?/topic/473021-invisible-syndicate-medallions/

patchlogs.name: Warframe: Sanctuary
patchlogs.changes: 8 Syndicate Medallions are now guaranteed to appear in any Syndicate Mission.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.13.8
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue causing Syndicate Missions to behave like normal Crossfire Missions, in addition to featuring no Medallions.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.13
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Syndicate Medallion count inappropriately resetting after death.  The counter will now always be clear as to how many Medallions are left in a mission.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.10.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed instances where players became unable to move after picking up Syndicate Medallions or other interactable objects.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.6.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Medallions not appearing in Syndicate Daily Missions.

name: Mod Fusion Segment
description: Install this segment to enable the Mod Fusion function within the MODS terminal of your Orbiter.

name: Mod Transmute Segment
description: Install this segment to enable the Mod Transmutation function within the MODS terminal of your Orbiter.

name: Moonlight Dragonlily
description: This uncommon plant can only be found at night.

name: Moonlight Jadeleaf
description: This rare plant can only be found at night.

name: Moonlight Threshcone
description: This common plant can only be found at night.

name: Morphics
description: An amorphous solid. Possibly Orokin technology.

patchlogs.name: Update 19.13.0
patchlogs.changes: Replaced Orokin Cell with Gallium, and replaced Neural Sensors with Morphics as a crafting requirement in the Rhino Blueprint. This is also in the interest of using Rare Resources found on earlier planets to allow for Rhino to be crafted earlier on!

name: Mutalist Alad V Nav Coordinate
description: Nav coordinates of Alad V's Infestation Research Ship

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.5.3
patchlogs.changes: Renamed Infested Alad V Nav Coordinate to Mutalist Alad V Nav Coordinate.

name: Nano Spores
description: Fibrous technocyte tumour. Handle Infested tissue with caution.

name: Naramon Lens
description: Channels Affinity into Focus for the Naramon Way.

name: Nav Coordinate
description: Coordinate used to locate lost ships.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed localization descriptions on Lephantis Nav Coordinates, they now refer to Lephantis instead of Golem.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.5.3
patchlogs.changes: Renamed Infested Alad V Nav Coordinate to Mutalist Alad V Nav Coordinate.

name: Neural Sensors
description: Implanted neural-link for controlling augmentations. Grineer design.

patchlogs.name: Update 19.13.0
patchlogs.changes: Replaced Orokin Cell with Gallium, and replaced Neural Sensors with Morphics as a crafting requirement in the Rhino Blueprint. This is also in the interest of using Rare Resources found on earlier planets to allow for Rhino to be crafted earlier on!

patchlogs.name: Update 16.4
patchlogs.changes: The Raptor will now drop Neural Sensors instead of Orokin Cells.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.16.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed incorrect Market description of Neural Sensors and Neurodes.

name: Neurodes
description: Biotech sensor organ harvested from Infested entities.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.16.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed incorrect Market description of Neural Sensors and Neurodes.

name: Nitain Extract
description: Each vial is produced by the painstaking expression of billions of rare, ocean-vent dwelling microorganisms.

name: Nutrio Incubator Upgrade Segment
description:
Upgrades the Orbiter's Incubator with the following features:
- Stasis Recovery reduced to 30 mins- Stasis Recovery can be rushed with Credits- Reduced price of stabilizers- Egg incubation reduced by a day- Stabilizers last twice as long

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Update 22.9.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed not being able to Chat link the "Landing Craft Foundry Segment" and the "Nutrio Incubator Upgrade Segment".

name: Omega Beacon
description: Locator beacon broadcasting on the Omega frequency

name: Omega Isotope
description: Produced by a Fomorian’s power core, these particles only appear on or around planets where a Fomorian is present.

name: Orokin Archive
description: Archive detailing the locations of hidden Archwing technology

name: Orokin Catalyst
description: Orokin modification technology used to super-charge weaponry. Doubles the available Mod Capacity on a Weapon.

name: Orokin Cell
description: Ancient energy cell from the Orokin era.

patchlogs.name: Update 19.13.0
patchlogs.changes: Replaced Orokin Cell with Gallium, and replaced Neural Sensors with Morphics as a crafting requirement in the Rhino Blueprint. This is also in the interest of using Rare Resources found on earlier planets to allow for Rhino to be crafted earlier on!

patchlogs.name: Update 17.3.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Drekar Heavy Gunners dropping Orokin Cells.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.4
patchlogs.changes: The Raptor will now drop Neural Sensors instead of Orokin Cells.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.13
patchlogs.changes: Added a 3 x Orokin Cells to TIII Survival Rewards.

patchlogs.name: Update 13.8.0: Breeding Grounds
patchlogs.changes: Increased the number of Orokin Cells received as T3 Survival awards from 1 to 3 per batch.

patchlogs.name: Update 13.7.1
patchlogs.changes: Removed Vitality and other common gear from Void Vor’s drops, replaced with option of Orokin Cell or Argon Crystal AND one of four Cicero Crisis mods.

name: Orokin Cipher
description: This device is used to bypass Orokin encryptions.

name: Orokin Ducats
description: Currency exchanged for Prime components and used to purchase items from the Void Trader.

name: Orokin Reactor
description: Reactor used to super-charge Warframes. Doubles the available Mod Capacity on a Warframe, Archwing, and Companions.

name: Oxium
description: Oxium is a rare lighter than air alloy of Orokin origin.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.3.4
patchlogs.changes: Reduced the Magus Elevate from 2300 to 230 Oxium per craft.*We Are Running A Script To Refund The Above Differences To As Many People As Possible, But We Only Have 30 Days Of History (Since October 17). Apologies To Those Missed But We'Re Confident We'Ll Get As Many People As Possible. This Script Digs Back Through Time Quite A Bit, And We Expect It To Run Over Night And For Refunds To Be Given Tomorrow (November 17).

patchlogs.name: The Vacuum Within: Hotfix #2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Oxium Ospreys suicide charging immediately.

patchlogs.name: Update 18.12.0: Vauban Prime & 18.12.1
patchlogs.changes: Reduced the Oxium crafting cost for Vauban Prime Chassis to 7,000.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.0.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Oxium Ospreys constantly ragdolling, instead of possibly exploding on occasion.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.1.5
patchlogs.changes: Increased the amount of Oxium that drops from Grineer Underwater Oxium Caches to 250.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.7.0 Nova Prime
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Feral Kubrow dropping Oxium.

name: Partner Quittance
description: Medallion of The Perrin Sequence syndicate. Can be traded in on relay syndicate hubs for additional standing.

name: Plastids
description: A disgusting nanite-infested tissue mass.

name: Polymer Bundle
description: A hard, thermoplastic casing. Manufactured by Corpus.

patchlogs.name: Hydroid Prime: Update 21.6.0
patchlogs.changes: Reduced the Razorback Cipher cost from 3500 Polymer Bundle to 1500 Polymer Bundle. Back in May of this year we made numerous fixes towards the Razorback Armada, and with another Armada to appear soon we took a second look at the Polymer friction involved with this non-useable Blueprint. See here for past fixes you can expect: https://forums.warframe.com/topic/797284-sharpening-our-razorbacks-a-pc-weekend-post-mortem/

name: Proof Fragment
description: One part of a long lost mathematical proof.

name: Pulsating Tubercles
description: A grizzly trophy extracted from the corpse of a Juggernaut.

name: Quittance
description: Medallion of The Perrin Sequence syndicate. Can be traded in on relay syndicate hubs for additional standing.

name: Rubedo
description: A jagged crystalline ore. Gives off radiant energy.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Update 22.10.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Gallium, Argon, and Rubedo Decorations appearing blown out when placed in your Orbiter.

patchlogs.name: Update 13.8.0: Breeding Grounds
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Rubedo Skin not working on Rhino Prime.

name: Ruk'S Claw
description: This plant was introduced to arid regions across the Origin System, for its ability to collect moisture in harsh environments.

name: Salvage
description: High value metals collected from war salvage.

patchlogs.name: Update 21: Chains of Harrow
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed rogue trigger that was poking into other levels causing unwanted space zones in the Infested Salvage tileset.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 19.13.1
patchlogs.changes: Improved enemy navigation paths in the Infested Salvage game mode.

patchlogs.name: Banshee Prime: Hotfix 19.11.5 + 19.11.6
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a script error when playing Infested Salvage.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.9.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Nidus’ Market Build tab stating his parts drop from the ‘Purify’ mission when it’s actually the ‘Infested Salvage’ mission.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.6.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed not being affected by Armor deterioration in Infested Salvage/Jordas Verdict when transferring from Operator to Warframe or when playing as the Client.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.5.3
patchlogs.changes: Reduced Armor drain & damage at 0 Armor in Infested Salvage
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Armor not resetting after respawn in Infested Salvage

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.5.1 + 19.5.2
patchlogs.changes: Adjusted spawns in Infested Salvage to be more evenly spread
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Infested getting stuck in spawn room in Infested Salvage

patchlogs.name: Specters of the Rail: Hotfix 13
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed being rewarded 0 Salvage instead of 500 for completing the Venus to Mercury Junction and Earth to Venus Junction.

name: Seed
description: Medallion of the New Loka syndicate. Can be traded in on relay syndicate hubs for additional standing.

name: Severed Bile Sac
description: A grizzly trophy extracted from the corpse of a Juggernaut.

name: Simulacrum Access Key
description:
Grants access to the Simulacrum.
In the Simulacrum you can face mimeographs of enemies you have fully researched with the Codex.

patchlogs.name: Octavia's Anthem: Hotfix 20.2.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed being able to multi-purchase Syndicate items that don’t need to be purchased more than once (Simulacrum Access Key, etc).

name: Sol-Battery Widget
description: Recharges Synthesis Scanner charges.

name: Stable Corruptor
description: Injected into a Fomorian Reactor this corruptor will imbalance the fuels. Critically imbalanced reactors will eventually implode, destroy the ship. Slow but effective, recommended for Solo Tenno.

name: Sunlight Dragonlily
description: This uncommon plant can only be found during the day.

name: Sunlight Jadeleaf
description: This rare plant can only be found during the day.

name: Sunlight Threshcone
description: This common plant can only be found during the day.

name: Synthula
description: Distilled fuel for stims.

name: Tellurium
description: This rare metal is foreign to the Origin System and can only be found in asteroids that have made the long journey from other stars.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Update 22.15.0
patchlogs.changes: A special UI message is now displayed when picking up Tellurium, or any of the Eidolon Shards (similar to Argon Crystal).

patchlogs.name: Octavia’s Anthem: Hotfix 20.2.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Tellurium not dropping on Submersible nodes.

name: Tethra Data Fragments
description: Intercepted encrypted fragment of Grineer communications.

name: Unairu Lens
description: Channels Affinity into Focus for the Unairu Way.

name: Vay Hek Nav Coordinate
description: Coordinate used to locate Councilor Vay Hek.

name: Vazarin Lens
description: Channels Affinity into Focus for the Vazarin Way.

name: Vector-Thread Widget
description: Reduces the time required to scan a target with the Synthesis Scanner.

name: Vestan Moss
description: One of the few known plant species able to thrive on asteroids in deep space.

name: Void Traces
description: A substance used to increase the power within Relics.

patchlogs.name: Specters of the Rail: Hotfix 13
patchlogs.changes: Void Traces cap is now Mastery Rank based (100 + 50 * MR).

name: Zenurik Lens
description: Channels Affinity into Focus for the Zenurik Way.

name: Distilling Extractor
description:
The Distilling Extractor has an increased chance of acquiring uncommon and rare resources.
Deploy this Extractor on a planet to collect resources. It must be emptied regularly and monitored for damage.

name: Distilling Extractor Prime
description:
The Distilling Extractor Prime has an increased chance of acquiring uncommon and rare resources.
Deploy this Extractor on a planet to collect large amounts of resources. It must be emptied regularly and monitored for damage.

name: Titan Extractor
description:
Deploy the EXTRACTOR on a planet to collect resources.
Must be emptied regularly for maximum efficiency and monitored for damage.

name: Titan Extractor Prime
description:
Deploy the EXTRACTOR on a planet to collect large amounts of resources.
Must be emptied regularly for maximum efficiency and monitored for damage.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Update 22.1.0
patchlogs.changes: Reduced the Resource costs for all Zaw Grips and Handles (apart from the Balla and Peye).

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.8.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the UI not identifying the Juttni/Clapkra Brace recharge delay reduction/energy increase respectively.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Update 22.1.0
patchlogs.changes: Clapkra Brace energy ammo increased from 20 to 40

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Update 22.12.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Operator Granmu Prism dealing more damage if you were a Client. Now Client and Host deal the same damage.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.8.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed being able to fire the Granmu Prism faster than intended by using Void Blast cancels.

patchlogs.name: Beasts of the Sanctuary: Update 22.19.0
patchlogs.changes: Zaw Strikes Sepfahn, Rabvee, Dokram and handles Korb and Shtung now have a chance to be used in Hok's Daily Specials.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Update 22.2.0
patchlogs.changes: Kronsh base damage increased from 81 to 86.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Update 22.2.0
patchlogs.changes: Kroostra additional damage increased from 9 to 14.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Update 22.2.0
patchlogs.changes: Kwath additional damage increased from 9 to 14.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.6.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed missing description for the Lohrin Brace boosting critical and status chance introduced in Update 22.1.0.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Update 22.1.0
patchlogs.changes: Lohrin Brace now boosts critical and status chance by 12% each.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Update 22.2.0
patchlogs.changes: Mewan base damage increased from 81 to 86.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Update 22.1.0
patchlogs.changes: Reduced the Resource costs for all Zaw Grips and Handles (apart from the Balla and Peye).

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Update 22.4.0
patchlogs.changes: Returned the Plague Keewar Strike to a Scythe Stance when used with one handed Grips.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.3.4
patchlogs.changes: Adjusted the weapon trail FX on the Plague Keewar.

patchlogs.name: Beasts of the Sanctuary: Update 22.19.0
patchlogs.changes: Zaw Strikes Sepfahn, Rabvee, Dokram and handles Korb and Shtung now have a chance to be used in Hok's Daily Specials.

patchlogs.name: Beasts of the Sanctuary: Hotfix 22.18.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Rabvee playing the wrong hit effect sounds.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Update 22.2.0
patchlogs.changes: Ruhang II additional damage increased from 18 to 28.

patchlogs.name: Beasts of the Sanctuary: Update 22.19.0
patchlogs.changes: Zaw Strikes Sepfahn, Rabvee, Dokram and handles Korb and Shtung now have a chance to be used in Hok's Daily Specials.

patchlogs.name: Beasts of the Sanctuary: Hotfix 22.18.5
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue with the Sepfahn Zaw part making extra cloth dangles when made into a Nikana.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.0.9
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed amps built using Shwaak Prism and Shraksun Scaffold not passing through Volt’s Electric Shield.

patchlogs.name: Beasts of the Sanctuary: Update 22.19.0
patchlogs.changes: Zaw Strikes Sepfahn, Rabvee, Dokram and handles Korb and Shtung now have a chance to be used in Hok's Daily Specials.

patchlogs.fixes: Fixed amps built using Shwaak Prism and Shraksun Scaffold not passing through Volt’s Electric Shield.
